api.name: addRule
api.api_signature: public void addRule (int verb, int subject)
api.description: Adds a layout rule to be interpreted by the RelativeLayout.

parameter.name: verb
parameter.description: int: a layout verb, such as RelativeLayout.ALIGN_RIGHT

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: int: the ID of another view to use as an anchor, or a boolean value (represented as RelativeLayout.TRUE for true or 0 for false)

api.name: addRule
api.description: Adds a layout rule to be interpreted by the RelativeLayout.

parameter.name: verb
parameter.description: int: a layout verb, such as RelativeLayout.ALIGN_PARENT_LEFT

api.name: debug
api.description: Returns a String representation of this set of layout parameters.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: String: the String to prepend to the internal representation

parameter.name: String
parameter.description: a String with the following format: output + "ViewGroup.LayoutParams={ width=WIDTH, height=HEIGHT }"

api.name: getRule
api.description: Returns the layout rule associated with a specific verb.

parameter.name: verb
parameter.description: int: one of the verbs defined by RelativeLayout, such as ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_LEFT

parameter.name: int
parameter.description: the id of another view to use as an anchor, a boolean value (represented as RelativeLayout.TRUE for true or 0 for false), or -1 for verbs that don't refer to another sibling (for example, ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_BOTTOM)

api.name: getRules
api.description: Retrieves a complete list of all supported rules, where the index is the rule verb, and the element value is the value specified, or "false" if it was never set. There will be no resolution of relative rules done.

api.name: removeRule
api.description: Removes a layout rule to be interpreted by the RelativeLayout.

parameter.name: verb
parameter.description: int: One of the verbs defined by RelativeLayout, such as ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_LEFT.

api.name: resolveLayoutDirection
api.description: This will be called by View.requestLayout() to resolve layout parameters that are relative to the layout direction.

parameter.name: layoutDirection
parameter.description: int: the direction of the layout View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL
